item.description:
HI all,

 

I hope you can make it down to Minors Golf Course in Middletown.  I am sorry I have not been able to host any meetups as mom passed away this past Septeber 27th, she was a golfer too and a very good one.

 

We can get down there by 10:30 and tee off at 11 AM like we usually do, I sure hope to see all of you there, Gloria will be coming up from Branford, CT so we have two already, lets see if we can get 10 or more like the last time , you guys are really alot of fun and hope to see all of you and new ones !  Come on now, you new golfers get here and introduce yourself to me please !

 

Judi
item.name: Minors Golf Course-Middletown, CT 9 Holes
